articles.title: Perth hospital reports coronavirus exposure incident - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Three staff members of the Royal Perth Hospital have potentially been exposed to coronavirus after a safety breach. 

A patient infected with COVID-19 was transported to the intensive care unit in a service lift which was not sectioned off.

articles.title: How does Australia's vaccination efforts compare with other Asia-Pacific countries? - ABC News
